text:
@JRubinBlogger No, he’s called in sick for three days in a row.I’m sure it’s just the common cold. Nothing serious could possibly have infected him since he practiced good hygiene &hand washing &wore a mask when he visited a hospital full of Covid19 patients.
Oh, my bad, he didn’t wear a mask.
